level.text: The D.C. Energy Extension Service (EES) Conservation Demonstration Awards Program (ECDAP) was established with federal funds by the D.C. Office of Energy to encourage local innovative energy conservation outreach activities.
Applicants seeking demonstration award grants shall submit proposals in areas that demonstrate energy savings for the commercial or residential sectors of the District of Columbia.
The Director of the D.C. Office of Energy (hereinafter, “Director”) shall be ultimately responsible for the EES program.
The Program Manager for the EES Program shall be responsible for the coordination, administration, and day-to-day operation of the program.
